analyzed: smri ti bi d+hi na ma/_bod skad du/_gshin gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/_bcom ldan

original: 'das gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/rim pa gnyis ni ldan pa yis/_/
analyzed: 'das gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/rim pa gnyis ni ldan pa yis/_/
translated: Through possessing the two stages,

analyzed: bdag gi snying kha'i 'od zer gyis/_/rigs drug dug sbyong tshhe 'das kyi/_/rnam shes a'i rnam pa dgug_/nyon cig tshhe 'das rigs kyi bu/_/las kyi dbang
translated: the light rays from my heart purify the poisons of the six classes and summon the consciousness of the deceased in the form of the letter A.🔽Listen, child of the deceased,🔽through the power of karma you have wandered for a long time in samsara,

original: gis 'khor bar yun rings 'khyams/_/'khrul pa'i dbang gis mi dge sna tshhogs
analyzed: gis 'khor bar yun rings 'khyams/_/'khrul pa'i dbang gis mi dge sna tshhogs

analyzed: spyad/_/sdug bsngal 'dam du bying khyod snying re rje/_/dad dang mos pa'i
translated: and you have sunk into the mire of suffering. I have compassion for you.🔽Come here with a mind of faith and interest,

original: sems kyis 'dir shog la/_/dkon mchog gsum dang bla ma spyi bos mchod/_/
analyzed: sems kyis 'dir shog la/_/dkon mchog gsum dang bla ma spyi bos mchod/_/
translated: and with the crown of your head honor the Three Jewels and the guru.🔽Rest in equipoise on the meaning of the nonduality of samsara and nirvana.

original: 'khor 'das gnyis med don la mnyam par zhog_/lam mchog 'di la bu khyod
analyzed: 'khor 'das gnyis med don la mnyam par zhog_/lam mchog 'di la bu khyod
translated: Child, you should enter this supreme path.

original: 'jug par mdzod/_/om hrish+thah_wi kri ta na na hum hum phat phat/_che ge mo a kar+sha
analyzed: 'jug par mdzod/_/om hrish+thah_wi kri ta na na hum hum phat phat/_che ge mo a kar+sha
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ vihṛta na na hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ, such and such a one akarṣaya jaḥ🔽The king of the dead, the protector of beings,

original: ya dza_/_gtsho bo rgyal ba 'gro ba'i mgon/_/'gro ba skyob pa'i don brtshon pa/_/
analyzed: ya dza_/_gtsho bo rgyal ba 'gro ba'i mgon/_/'gro ba skyob pa'i don brtshon pa/_/
translated: is the one who is skilled in the means of protecting beings.

original: gshin gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/
analyzed: gshin gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/
translated: This is called the “rite of the dead.”🔽From this day forward, I go for refuge

original: stobs chen 'jigs pa kun sel la/_/di ring nyid nas skyabs su mchi/_/de'i
analyzed: stobs chen 'jigs pa kun sel la/_/di ring nyid nas skyabs su mchi/_/de'i
translated: to the one who is powerful and who removes all fear,🔽and to the Dharma that he has realized,

original: thugs su chud pa'i chos/_/'khor ba'i 'jigs pa sel ba dang /_/byang chub
analyzed: thugs su chud pa'i chos/_/'khor ba'i 'jigs pa sel ba dang /_/byang chub

original: sems dpa'i tshhogs la yang /_/de bzhin yang dag skyabs su mchi#/_/sngon
analyzed: sems dpa'i tshhogs la yang /_/de bzhin yang dag skyabs su mchi#/_/sngon
translated: in the same way, I go for refuge in them.🔽Previously, I transgressed your words,

analyzed: chad khyed kyi bka' las 'das/_/da ni 'jigs pa cher mthong nas/_/khyed la
translated: but now, seeing great fear,🔽I go for refuge to you;

analyzed: skyabs su mchi lags kyi/_/'jigs pa myur du bsal du gsol/_/nyon cig
translated: please quickly remove my fear.🔽Listen, great obstructor, listen!

original: bgegs chen khyod nyon cig_/che ge zhes bya'i tshhe 'das 'di/_/dkon mchog
analyzed: bgegs chen khyod nyon cig_/che ge zhes bya'i tshhe 'das 'di/_/dkon mchog
translated: Since this person named such and such🔽has gone for refuge to the Three Jewels,🔽you must release him this very instant!

analyzed: gsum la skyabs song bas/_/da lta nyid du btang bar gyis/_/khro bo 'bar
translated: The blazing wrathful one

analyzed: ba'i bka' byung gis/_/gal te bka' las 'das na ni/_/rdo rje dbyug pa
translated: the blazing vajra club🔽will split your head into a hundred pieces.

analyzed: 'bar ba yis/_/mgo bo tshhal ba brgyar 'gas so/_/om hrishih_wi kri ta na na hum

analyzed: hum phat phat/_che ge dang che ge bi de shwa ya phat/_tshhe 'das 'di la gnod pa'i
translated: All the many bhūtas🔽that are obstacles to this rite,🔽gods, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas,

analyzed: bgegs/_/lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang /_/nam mkha' lding dang sha za'i

analyzed: tshhogs/_/'byung po mang po thams cad dag_/mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di
translated: accept this sacrificial torma

analyzed: bzhes la/_/gnas 'dir ma gnas myur du deng /_/rgyal ba'i bka' la gang
translated: and do not remain in this place, but leave quickly.🔽Those who transgress the command of the Victor🔽will be killed and suppressed.

analyzed: 'da' ba/_/gsad cing mnan pa'i las mthar byed/_/om hrin+ti wi kri ta na na

analyzed: hu~m hu~m phat phat/_che ge mo tsh+tshha ta ya phat/_'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das

analyzed: mkha' 'gro'i tshhogs/_/las kyi gshin rje gshin rje'i 'khor dang bcas/_/

analyzed: phyogs skyong rgyal chen sde brgyad bran g.yog bcas/_/ma mo gying chen pho nya'i tshhogs
translated: the mamos, the eight great kinglets, and the hosts of messengers,🔽listen! This great harm-doer called so-and-so

analyzed: rnams nyon/_/che ge zhes bya'i gnod byed chen po 'di/_/sems can yongs
translated: is harming sentient beings.🔽He is destroying the teachings of the Buddha.

original: la 'tshhe byed 'di yin gyi/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa bshig byed 'di yin gyi/_/
analyzed: la 'tshhe byed 'di yin gyi/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa bshig byed 'di yin gyi/_/

original: dkon mchog dbu 'phang dmod byed 'di yin gyi/_/bla ma rnams kyi sku dgra 'di
analyzed: dkon mchog dbu 'phang dmod byed 'di yin gyi/_/bla ma rnams kyi sku dgra 'di

original: yin gyi/_/rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i bar chad 'dis byas kyi/_/'di 'dra nam yang
analyzed: yin gyi/_/rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i bar chad 'dis byas kyi/_/'di 'dra nam yang
translated: He is creating obstacles for the yogis and practitioners.🔽Since it is said that such a one should never be left alone,

original: bzhag par ma gsungs pas/_/da lta nyid du gsad cing sgrol bar bskul/_/
analyzed: bzhag par ma gsungs pas/_/da lta nyid du gsad cing sgrol bar bskul/_/
translated: I urge you to kill and liberate him this very instant!🔽Do not protect him, do not defend him, do not be his refuge!🔽Take away his power and his strength!

original: 'di la mgon dang bsrung skyob ma mdzad par/_/bdag gis ma nyes bzu dang dbang po mdzod/_/bka' nyan dam can srung ma 'khor dang bcas/_/spyan
analyzed: 'di la mgon dang bsrung skyob ma mdzad par/_/bdag gis ma nyes bzu dang dbang po mdzod/_/bka' nyan dam can srung ma 'khor dang bcas/_/spyan
translated: O oath-bound guardians who obey the commands, together with your retinues,

original: drang gdan dbul sngon gyi dam tshhig bsgrag_/gtor ma mchod stod drag po'i
analyzed: drang gdan dbul sngon gyi dam tshhig bsgrag_/gtor ma mchod stod drag po'i

original: las la bskul/_/lcags phye dug khrag mda' phur rdo ral dbal/_/rdo rje la
analyzed: las la bskul/_/lcags phye dug khrag mda' phur rdo ral dbal/_/rdo rje la
translated: and the iron powder, poison, blood, arrows, spears, stones, razors, and vajras,🔽and so forth, are cast into the weapons and the target is struck.

original: sogs thun brab mtshhon gyis bsnun/_/om hrin+ti wi kri ta na na hum hum phat phat/_che
analyzed: sogs thun brab mtshhon gyis bsnun/_/om hrin+ti wi kri ta na na hum hum phat phat/_che
translated: Om hrin hrin vikrita na na hum hum phat phat🔽great🔽Mara, destroy! Phat!

original: ge ma ra ya phat/_bdud dpung ma lus 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor nas/_/ya
analyzed: ge ma ra ya phat/_bdud dpung ma lus 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor nas/_/ya
translated: From the mandala that conquers all the armies of Mara,

original: man ta ka yab yum dka' byung gi/_/las kyi gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa
analyzed: man ta ka yab yum dka' byung gi/_/las kyi gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa
translated: the father and mother Yamantaka, together with the retinue of the karma yakshas,

original: yis/_/gdug pa'i dgra bgegs mnan cing bzung bar gyis/_/phyogs
analyzed: yis/_/gdug pa'i dgra bgegs mnan cing bzung bar gyis/_/phyogs
translated: press down and bind the evil enemies and obstructors.🔽From the mandala of the four activities in the four directions,

analyzed: bzhi phrin las bzhi'i dkyil 'khor nas/_/bcom ldan khro bo bzhi'i bka' byung gi/_/
translated: the command of the four wrathful conquerors has come forth.🔽The karma yakshas, together with their retinue,

analyzed: las kyi gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa yis/_/gdug pa'i dgra bgegs mnan
translated: press down and bind the evil enemies and obstructors.

original: cing bzung bar gyis/_/sgo bzhi bdud bzhi dag pa'i dkyil 'khor nas/_/
analyzed: cing bzung bar gyis/_/sgo bzhi bdud bzhi dag pa'i dkyil 'khor nas/_/
translated: From the mandala of the four gates, the purification of the four Maras,🔽the command of the four gate-keepers who perform the activities has come forth.

analyzed: las byed sgo ba bzhi'i bka' byung gi/_/las kyi gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa
translated: The karma yakshas, together with their retinue,

original: yis/_/gdug pa'i dgra bgegs mnan cing bzung bar gyis/_/mtshhams
analyzed: yis/_/gdug pa'i dgra bgegs mnan cing bzung bar gyis/_/mtshhams
translated: bind and suppress the evil enemies and obstructors.🔽From the mandala of the four elements,

original: bzhi 'byung ba bzhi'i dkyil 'khor nas/_/tshhad med lha mo bzhi'i bka' byung gi/_/
analyzed: bzhi 'byung ba bzhi'i dkyil 'khor nas/_/tshhad med lha mo bzhi'i bka' byung gi/_/
translated: the four goddesses of immeasurables have spoken.🔽With the karma yamas and their retinue,

original: las kyi gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa yis/_/gdug pa'i dgra bgegs mnan
analyzed: las kyi gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa yis/_/gdug pa'i dgra bgegs mnan
translated: bind and suppress the evil enemies and obstructors.

original: cing bzung bar gyis/_/log 'dren dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor nas//
analyzed: cing bzung bar gyis/_/log 'dren dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor nas//
translated: From the mandala of subduing the misleading enemies and obstructors,🔽the karma yamas who blaze like fire have spoken.🔽With the karma yamas and their retinue,

original: las byed me ltar 'bar ba'i bka' byung gi/_/las kyi gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa yis/_/gdug pa'i dgra bgegs mnan cing bzung bar gyis/_/om
analyzed: las byed me ltar 'bar ba'i bka' byung gi/_/las kyi gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa yis/_/gdug pa'i dgra bgegs mnan cing bzung bar gyis/_/om
translated: bind and suppress the evil enemies and obstructors.🔽Om hrīḥ vikṛtānana hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ che ge stam apaya laṃ.

original: hrin+ti wi kri ta na na hum hum phat phat che ge stam pa ya lam/_bgegs sbyang sdig pa zhi
analyzed: hrin+ti wi kri ta na na hum hum phat phat che ge stam pa ya lam/_bgegs sbyang sdig pa zhi
translated: The meaning of purifying obstructors and pacifying misdeeds🔽is purifying, sprinkling, bathing, and the preparatory rite.

original: ba'i don/_/sbyang brab khrus dang sta gon no/_/yongs rdzogs pa'i dbang byin la/_/
analyzed: ba'i don/_/sbyang brab khrus dang sta gon no/_/yongs rdzogs pa'i dbang byin la/_/
translated: The complete empowerment is given.

original: gshin gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/
analyzed: gshin gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/
translated: This is called the “Yama ritual.”

original: rdo rje can de mchod dang bstod/_/snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa lnga/_/stong pa
analyzed: rdo rje can de mchod dang bstod/_/snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa lnga/_/stong pa
translated: The appearance is the five tathagatas,🔽The emptiness is great luminosity,

original: 'od gsal chen po'i dang /_/zung 'jug bde ba chen po'i sku/_/rang bzhin
analyzed: 'od gsal chen po'i dang /_/zung 'jug bde ba chen po'i sku/_/rang bzhin
translated: And the union is the body of great bliss.🔽Go to your natural abode.

original: gnas su gshegs par mdzod/_/om sarba ta tha ga ta swa pa ri wa ra om ah_badzra
analyzed: gnas su gshegs par mdzod/_/om sarba ta tha ga ta swa pa ri wa ra om ah_badzra
translated: Om sarva tathagata saparivara om ah hum vajra badzra.🔽Earth, water, fire, and wind,

original: badzra /_sa dang chu dang me dang rlung /_/'byung ba bzhi las gyur pa yi/_/rnam
analyzed: badzra /_sa dang chu dang me dang rlung /_/'byung ba bzhi las gyur pa yi/_/rnam
translated: From the four elements🔽This aggregate of ripened karma

analyzed: smin las grub phung po 'di/_/nam mkha'i dbyings su thim gyur cig_/om ah_hu~m
translated: Dissolves into the realm of space.🔽Om ah hum jnana chakra jvala jvala ram ho.

original: dz+nya na tshakra dz+wa la dz+wa la ram ho/_thal ba bsdus la mchod rten bsgrub/_/dben
analyzed: dz+nya na tshakra dz+wa la dz+wa la ram ho/_thal ba bsdus la mchod rten bsgrub/_/dben

analyzed: pa'i gnas su mchod pa bya/_/yang na ye shes 'khor lo dang /_/bcas pa
translated: The wisdom wheel and its retinue🔽And make offerings.🔽Make the bones into a deity or a torma.

analyzed: brtag tu 'bad pas mchod/_/rus bu lha 'am bdud rtshir bya/_/sdig pa zhi
translated: Purify them with the ritual of purifying evil.🔽Gather the ashes and make them into a dharmakaya.

original: ba'i cho gas sbyang /_/thal ba bsdus la chos skur bya/_/ngan song 'jigs bral
analyzed: ba'i cho gas sbyang /_/thal ba bsdus la chos skur bya/_/ngan song 'jigs bral
translated: Free from the fear of the lower realms,

original: mtho ris thob/_/gang de sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur gsung /_/gshin po rjes su🔽gzung 7ba'i cho ga 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis rjes su bzung ba'i pan+di ta grub thob
analyzed: mtho ris thob/_/gang de sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur gsung /_/gshin po rjes su gzung 7ba'i cho ga 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis rjes su bzung ba'i pan+di ta grub thob
translated: And even buddhahood itself.🔽The Ritual for Grasping the Departed

original: chen po do b+hi he ru ka pas mdzad pa/_rdzogs sto//_//
analyzed: chen po do b+hi he ru ka pas mdzad pa/_rdzogs sto//_//
translated: Composed by the great accomplished paṇḍita Dhobi Heruka, who was accepted by Mañjughoṣa.

original: rgya gar gyi pan+di ta dik+shu mang ga la dang /_lo tsh+tshha ba zla ba 'od zer gyis
analyzed: rgya gar gyi pan+di ta dik+shu mang ga la dang /_lo tsh+tshha ba zla ba 'od zer gyis

original: rgyang ro rkyang po'i rtshug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o//_//
analyzed: rgyang ro rkyang po'i rtshug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o//_//
translated: It was translated at the temple of Kyangpo Rong in the region of Latö.🔽Copied from the texts of Lama Dorjé Zangpo.

analyzed: bla ma rdo rje bzang po'i phyag dpe la bshus/_gzhan gcig yod pa de 'di'i

analyzed: 'brel pa yin par gda'/_dge zhing bkra shis par gyur cig/
translated: May it be virtuous and auspicious.
